name: Radiation Ward
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Heroes of the Darklands © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: A creature warded by this spell gains a +4 bonus on saving throws against radiation-based effects. In addition, the warded creature is immediately aware when it enters an area of radiation, as well as the radiation level (low, medium, high, or severe) suffusing the area.
text_zh: 此法术的受术者在对抗基于辐射的效果时，于豁免检定上获得+4加值。此外，当受术者踏入有辐射的区域时会立刻意识到这件事，并且知道肆虐此区域辐射的等级(低、中、高、严重)。
